name: I want to live ...
description:
A game to start in life

## Topic

Once upon a time a young spermatozoid dreamed to be able to run.
The brave spermatozoid start his journey of life to possess a heart and a body.
Our young hera dash into the scrum to retrieve what he missed so much: legs.
But inside the ovary he has to face the bad habits of his future parents. (Male, Female, Non-binary).
This young soldier should defend it self until his evolution has complete and finally start his journey.

## How to play

The game is composed of two phases.

## First phase - Race

You have to dodge and be the first.

| Symbol   | Action   |
|:-------- | --------:|
| Up       | Run      |
| Left     | Left     |
| Right    | Right    |

## Second phase - Arena

You have evolve to resists as long as you can.

| Symbol   | Action   |
|:-------- | --------:|
| LMC      | Shot     |
| Mouse    | Aim      |
| Up       | Up       |
| Down     | Down     |
| Left     | Left     |
| Right    | Right    |

Note: We censored us a lot during our brainstorming because we saw a political debate behind pro and contra abortion. We support free will.

**Tools**
Unity3D, Visual Studio, TextMeshPro, Audacity, MPC Essentials, Krita
